mapper.insert: insert into rgct_student_hist (hist_id, begin_date, end_date, operate, id, last_hist_id, name, age, class_name, current_state, is_lock, lock_scence, nested_deep) values (#{histId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastHistId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lockScence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nestedDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update rgct_student_hist set begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate = #{operate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_hist_id = #{lastHistId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_state = #{currentState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock_scence = #{lockScence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nested_deep = #{nestedDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER} where hist_id = #{histId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select hist_id, begin_date, end_date, operate, id, last_hist_id, name, age, class_name, current_state, is_lock, lock_scence, nested_deep from rgct_student_hist where hist_id = #{histId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
